english_example_sentence: If you serve your country well, grateful people remember you.
russian_example_sentence: Если ты хорошо служишь своей стране, благодарные люди тебя помнят.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen ülkene iyi hizmet etsen, minnettar insanlar seni anar.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen ülkene iyi ______, minnettar insanlar seni anar.
